short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build, Grow and Scale A Responsive FB Group

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Group Hyper Growth is an extension that will automate adding people from specific groups in your niche as your friends which you can then invite to join your group. It will also help to cancel invitations that where not accepted.
Then the final thing that this tool does is to help you build an email list from everyone who joins your group. Email is the traffic that you own as a marketer, so this is an invaluable tool for targeted list building of people in your niche that you can sell your offer to over and over again.This tool has removed all the grunt work involved in growing a group with targeted people who are already in similar groups. This tool mimic the customer journey that cuts across as natural from friends to joining your community, and in the process collect their email address. It will help to build an engaged group. The argument to build a group cannot be overemphasised as it help you to build a know, like and trust character. People tend to buy from those they know, like and trust.
